ISSUE.TITLE: Some guidelines in order to use devices remotely
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi there, Is there any way or clues on how to continue to manage devices once USB removed ? ## Regis A. Despres

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix images (#59) * Update browser-icons.js and device-icons.js Fix new npm name Signed-off-by: Matt Dann <mdann52@yahoo.co.uk> * Also update appstore icons Signed-off-by: Matt Dann <mdann52@yahoo.co.uk>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [Security] Bump lodash from 4.17.13 to 4.17.20 (#66) Bumps [lodash](https://github.com/lodash/lodash) from 4.17.13 to 4.17.20. **This update includes security fixes.** - [Release notes](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/releases) - [Commits](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/compare/4.17.13...4.17.20) Signed-off-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <support@dependabot.com> Co-authored-by: dependabot-preview[bot] <27856297+dependabot-preview[bot]@users.noreply.github.com>
